spell.name: Keystone Signet
entries: Activate the ancient Keystone Signet, recharging most of your signets and giving them extra power.
You regain all expended uses of your signets which require you to finish a short rest, except {@spell Keystone Signet|GuildWars}.

For the duration, when you target a hostile creature with a signet, target each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@dice 2d12} psychic damage and can't cast a spell or use an ability on their next turn. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Keystone Signet

Elite Signet. All of your signets except Keystone Signet are recharged. For 20 seconds, the next 0...5...6 time[s] you use a signet that targets a foe, all other foes adjacent to your target take 15...51...60 damage and are interrupted.

spell.name: Gash
entries: You wound your enemy grievously.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target is {@condition bleeding|GuildWars}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 6 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 6 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Gash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Wild Blow
entries: You imbue your weapon with as much magical power as possible, striking with all your might.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any stance on the target ends.
{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.
{@bold Adrenaline.} You lose all adrenaline.
Wild Blow
Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 5th.

spell.name: Flare
entries: Send out a searing hot flare.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

{@bold While Overcast}. On a hit, each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

components.m: a phial of phosphor

entries: Flare
Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frenzy
entries: Enter a frenzy, disregarding any defense.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you take 50% more damage.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Frenzy
Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} radiant damage, is knocked {@condition prone} and the attack roll misses. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
Bane Signet
Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Banish
entries: You reach out your hand and fire a blinding bolt of divine energy.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
If the target is a summoned creature or an undead, you have advantage on the attack roll, and on a hit, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

components.m: a crimson piece of paper

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Banish
Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

spell.name: Death Nova
entries: Enchant a friendly creature to explode on death, damaging and {@condition corruption|GuildWars|corrupting} everything around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, if the creature drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the creature and then target each other creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage and is corrupted for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Death Nova
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...85...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Deathly Swarm
entries: You send out a swarm of undead locusts.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} necrotic damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 20 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll with disadvantage against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

components.m: a jar filled with dirt and plants

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Deathly Swarm
Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...78...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

spell.name: Empathy
entries: Increase the empathy of an enemy to an unnatural degree.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save when the target makes an attack roll, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage and when the target makes a damage roll, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Empathy
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

spell.name: Fire Bolt Storm
entries: Conjure a storm of fiery bolts, which rain down from the sky.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 1d10} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

components.m: a pinte of oil

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Fire Storm
Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Backfire
entries: Create an arcane feedback loop in the mind of one creature, causing their spells to become volatile.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage per spell slot level.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Backfire
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

spell.name: Lightning Javelin
entries: Conjure a lighting javelin in your hand and throw it in a straight line, passing through all creatures along its path to its target.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage.
This attack ignores cover provided by other creatures.

Target each creature, other than you and the target, on the line between you and the target. Each target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} lightning damage.
{@bold Armor Penetration.}  This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

components.m: a javelin and a piece of fleece

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lightning Javelin

Spell. Send out a Lightning Javelin that strikes for 15...43...50 lightning damage if it hits. Lightning Javelin interrupts attacking foes. This spell has 25% armor penetration and strikes all foes between you and your target.

spell.name: Meteor
entries: Summon a meteor to crash down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 5 rounds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage or the fire damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.
Meteor
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

spell.name: Retribution
entries: Wreath yourself or an ally in retaliatory holy light, which punishes all those who harm you.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 50% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 10). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Retribution
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 3rd and the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Rodgort's Invocation
entries: Invoke the hellish flames of Rodgort.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 12d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

components.m: the scale of a red dragon

entries: Rodgort's Invocation
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes are struck for 15...99...120 fire damage and set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Read the Wind
entries: You focus your bond with nature to get insight into the air currents and the wind.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage and when you make an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.
{@bold Preparation.} If you cast a new preparation, this preparation ends.

components.m: a stick and a piece of string

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage and attack roll bonus each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Read the Wind
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...9...10 extra damage.

spell.name: Shielding Hands
entries: Envelop a friendly creature in spectral shielding hands, guarding them from damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast. Additionally, you cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.

components.m: half a dozen bushels of wool

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shielding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

spell.name: Orison of Healing
entries: You invigorate one friendly creature with the soothing rays of dawn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Orison of Healing
Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

spell.name: Reversal of Fortune
entries: Twist the fate around one friendly creature, healing them instead of harming them.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage and the target regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Fortune
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

spell.name: Healing Breeze
entries: You invoke a divine healing breeze around one friendly creature you can see, healing them over time.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Breeze
Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Infuse Health
entries: You sacrifice some of your health to mend another creature's injuries.

Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. You take necrotic damage equal to 50% of your current hit points, which can't be reduced in any way. The target regains hit points equal to 100% of the necrotic damage taken.

m.text: a drop of your own blood, a needle and a water skin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.
Infuse Health
Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

spell.name: Symbol of Wrath
entries: Sear a holy symbol of wrath on the surrounding ground, smiting all hostile creatures within 5 feet.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Symbol of Wrath
Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location in which the spell was cast take 8...27...32 holy damage each second.

spell.name: Animate Bone Horror
entries: Exploit a nearby corpse to create a Bone Horror.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, the target becomes a {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars}.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is friendly to you and your allies while you are conscious. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} becomes hostile towards everything. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} acts on your initiative, but takes it turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GuildWars} is in the DMs control.

components.m: pages of an old book

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block.
Animate Bone Horror
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone horror.

spell.name: Blood Reneawl
entries: Use some of your own blood in a ritual of renewal.
{@bold Sacrifice.} You take necrotic damage equal to 15% of your maximum hit points, which can't be reduced in any way.
For the duration, at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + spellcasting ability modifier.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a pinte of blood, a needle and a bag

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases each by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Blood Renewal
Enchantment Spell. For 7 seconds, you gain +3...5...6 Health regeneration. When Blood Renewal ends, you gain 40...160...190 Health.

spell.name: Faintheartedness
entries: Curse a creature with faintheartedness making them slower and deteriorating them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} per slot level above 1st.
Faintheartedness
Hex Spell. For the next 3...13...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

spell.name: Life Siphon
entries: Create a tether of life essence between you and another creature, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d6} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Siphon
Hex Spell. For 12...22...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Soul Barbs
entries: Curse a target to suffer each time they are targeted by another spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration if the target is the target of a spell which requires {@status concentration} or is an Enchantment/Hex, the target takes {@damage 2d10} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.
Soul Barbs
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, target foe takes 15...27...30 damage when an enchantment or hex is cast on that target.

spell.name: Vampiric Gaze
entries: Stare into the soul of a creature, stealing some of their life essence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Vampiric Gaze
Spell. Steal up to 18...52...60 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Vampire Touch
entries: Siphon the life energy of the creature you touch.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.
Vampiric Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to steal up to 29...65...74 Health.

spell.name: Lava Font
entries: Create fissures around you, which spew out lava, melting everything within range.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 3d8} fire damage.
{@bold While Overcast.} The radius of the spell increases by 5 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Lava Font

Spell. For 5 seconds, foes adjacent to the location where this spell was cast are struck for 5...41...50 fire damage each second. If you are Overcast, this spell strikes nearby foes instead of adjacent ones.

spell.name: Ether Feast
entries: Siphon the energy of a creature to heal yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by half as much.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, you regain hit points equal to four times the initiative lost.

components.m: a shaving of ice

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Lesser Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Cyclone Swing
entries: Imbue your weapon with magical force, to strike everyone around you.
Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entries: Cyclone Axe
Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Charm Animal
entries: Convince a beast to become your companion, by charming it.

Choose one beast, which has a challenge rating of 1 or lower, that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} by you until next dawn, at which point you can expend a spell slot of equal or higher level than the one used in the casting of this spell to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on the beast. To do this, you must have the {@spell Charm Animal|GuildWars} spell prepared, or any other spell which says that it can be used instead.

The {@condition charmed} creature is friendly to you and your companions. While the creature is {@condition charmed}, you have a telepathic link with it as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as "Attack that creature," "Run over there," or "Fetch that object." If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.

entries: You magically distort space around you, making attacks miss you.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC. If an attack misses you because of this bonus, your next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d6} or this spell ends.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
Distortion
Stance. For 1...4...5 second[s], you have a 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block an attack this way, you lose 2 Energy or Distortion ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: "Fear Me!"
entries: Intimidate nearby creatures to give you an opportunity to slip past their defenses, reducing their initiative and increasing your chance to critical hit them.

Target each creature other than you that can hear you within range. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d8} and the number you need to roll to score a critical hit against a target gets reduced by {@dice 1d4} for the duration. On a successful save, a target's next initiative roll gets reduced by half as much.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.
"Fear Me!"
Shout. All nearby foes lose 1...3...4 Energy. For 1...12...15 second[s], your melee attacks gain +5...25...30% chance of a critical hit against stationary foes.

spell.name: Earth Attunement
entries: Empower your earth magic, by attuning to the earth.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an earth themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a small shovel and a bucket

entries: Earth Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Dismember
entries: You attempt to sever off a body part.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 5 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 5 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Dismember
Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

spell.name: Jagged Strike
entries: Slash at your foe with a serrated edge.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GuildWars} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d4} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Lead Attack.} On a hit, this attack is considered a lead attack. Additionally, you can, immediately after you hit, cast an off-hand attack spell as an action or bonus action.

At 5th level, the melee attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} piercing damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).

{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.

{@bold Off-Hand Attack.} This attack must follow a lead attack and can be cast as a bonus action if the action this turn was a lead attack. On a hit, this attack is considered an off-hand attack. Additionally, you can, immediately after you hit, cast a dual attack spell as an action or bonus action.

spell.name: Eviscerate
entries: You eviscerate a creature, inflicting a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars}.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 3d8} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 8 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 8 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Eviscerate
Elite Axe Attack. If Eviscerate hits, you strike for +1...25...31 damage and inflict a Deep Wound, lowering your target's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entries: Shield a creature with the shield of judgment, which knocks attackers {@condition prone} if they hit the creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage from an attack, target the creature that dealt the damage. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

On a failed save for the duration, if a target regains hit points, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the healing and at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

spell.name: Power Block

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and lock them out of spells of the same school of magic.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, spells of the same school of magic can't be used again for the duration. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Power Block
Elite Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill and all skills of the same attribute are disabled for 1...10...12 seconds and that skill is interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

entries: Summon a shower of meteors at a specific location every turn.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} bludgeoning damage, {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
{@bold Overcast.} You become {@condition overcast|GuildWars} for 5 rounds.
Meteor Shower
Spell. Create a Meteor Shower at target foe's location. For 9 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down every 3 seconds.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make a Constitution saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 8 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 8 adrenaline per level above the original level.

At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.

Spell. All adjacent foes are struck for 30...114...135 fire damage.

entries: A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out, exploding on impact.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

{@bold While Overcast.} When you cast the spell, you can choose any number of creatures. The chosen creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell, and take no damage if they would normally take half damage on a successful save. Additionally, if a chosen creature was in the radius of the spell, that target gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage rolled.
Phoenix

Spell. A fiery Phoenix rises at your location and flies out to your target, exploding on impact. This explosion strikes your target and nearby foes for 10...50...60 fire damage. If you are Overcast, allies in the blast radius are healed for 20...68...80 Health.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points. The target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Resurrect

{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

spell.name: Crippling Anguish
entries: Psychically torture a creature, reducing their speed, limiting their attacks, and hurting them every turn.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, the target's speed is halved, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 2d10} psychic damage.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Crippling Anguish
Elite Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target moves and attacks 50% slower and suffers -1...7...8 Health degeneration.

Lightning Orb

{@bold Armor Penetration.} This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

On a successful save at the start of the target's next turn if you are {@status concentration||concentrating} on this spell, the target takes half as much damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
{@bold Armor Penetration.} This spell's lightning damage cannot be reduced in any way, except by immunities.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.

This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.

{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, you cannot do so again until you gain a level. Furthermore, once you used this spell, it cannot be unprepared until you gain a level.
Resurrection Signet
Signet. Resurrect target party member. That party member is returned to life with 100% Health and 25% Energy. This signet only recharges when you gain a morale boost.

spell.name: Signet of Capture (Cantrip)
entries: Capture the knowledge of a powerful creature.

Choose one hostile dead boss creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes, that you can see within range. Choose one spell which the target had prepared, that you could learn and that is equal to or lower than this spell's level, and replace this spell with the chosen spell permanently.
{@bold Signet.} Casting this spell does not cost a spell slot. Once you cast this spell, it gets replaced by the captured spell permanently.
Signet of Capture
Signet. Choose one skill from a nearby dead Boss of your profession. Signet of Capture is permanently replaced by that skill. If that skill was elite, gain 250 XP for every level you have earned.

entries: Capture the knowledge of a powerful creature.

Choose one hostile dead boss creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes, that you can see within range. spell.name: Counter Blow
entries: Use the momentary opening of a creature that attacked to attempt to knock them {@condition prone}.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and, if the target attacked on its last turn, must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 4 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 4 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Counter Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits an attacking foe, that foe is knocked down.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Backbreaker
entries: Brutally attempt to break a creature's spine, preventing them from walking.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
To stand up from {@condition prone}, the target must first succeed on a Strength saving throw or waste its movement in the attempt.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 9 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 9 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Backbreaker
Elite Hammer Attack. If Backbreaker hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage and your target is knocked down. If you have 8 Strength or higher, this knockdown lasts 4 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Heal Other
entries: Heal another creature.
Choose one creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Heal Other
Spell. Heal target other ally for 35...151...180 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Hands
entries: Envelop a creature in divine healing hands, healing them every time they take damage.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target takes damage, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Healing Hands
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target ally takes damage, that ally is healed for 5...29...35 Health.

components.m: a pair of sterilized gloves

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Crude Swing
entries: Strike your target and all creatures within 5 feet of them with a wide-reaching swing.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Crude Swing
Hammer Attack. Attack all adjacent foes. Each foe you hit is struck for +1...16...20 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Warrior's Endurance
entries: Magically enhance your endurance, enabling you to act quicker.
For the duration, when you hit with a melee attack, your next initiative roll gets increased by {@dice 1d6}.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Warrior's Endurance
Elite Skill. For 5...29...35 seconds, you gain 3 Energy each time you hit with a melee attack. Warrior's Endurance cannot raise your Energy above 10...22...25.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Staggering Blow
entries: Attempt to stagger your opponent, weakening them on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GuildWars|weakened} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Strength saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 4 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 4 adrenaline per level above the original level.
Staggering Blow
Hammer Attack. If this hammer blow hits, your target will suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd or 3rd level, the number of attacks increases by 1. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the number of attacks increases by 2. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 3.

spell.name: Overbearing Smash
entries: Exploit a creature's momentary vulnerability if they are {@condition prone}, to daze them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d6} damage and, if the target is knocked {@condition prone}, must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition dazed|GuildWars} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Overbearing Smash
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you deal +1...16...20 damage. If target foe is knocked down, that foe is Dazed for 1...7...8 second[s].

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Magehunter's Smash
entries: Attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}, creatures with a beneficial effect on them have a harder time resisting.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
If the target is under the effect of a beneficial spell, the target has disadvantage on the saving throw and this attack gains the Unblockable property.
{@bold Unblockable.} This spell ignores any temporary bonuses to AC.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 8 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 8 adrenaline per level above the original level.
{@bold Elite.} When preparing your spells, you can only prepare one elite spell.
Magehunter's Smash
Elite Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, target foe is knocked down. If your target is under the effects of an enchantment, this attack cannot be blocked.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

Power Attack
Melee Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Sprint
entries: Channel your magic into increasing your movement speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 10.
{@bold Stance.} If you enter a new stance, this stance ends.
This spell's duration increases by 1 round when you reach 5th level (2 rounds), 11th level (3 rounds), and 17th level (4 rounds).
Sprint
Stance. For 8...13...14 seconds, you move 25% faster.

spell.name: "Watch Yourself!"
entries: Increase your group's resilience.
Choose any number of creatures that can hear you within range. For the duration, whenever a target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
After triggering for the third time on a creature, this spell ends on that creature.

{@bold Adrenaline.} Instead of expending a spell slot, you cast this spell by expending 4 adrenaline. When casting this spell at a higher level, expend an additional 2 adrenaline per level above the original level.
"Watch Yourself!"
Shout. Party members within earshot gain +5...21...25 armor for 10 seconds. This shout ends after 10 incoming attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Quickening Zephyr
entries: Summon a nature spirit of quickening zephyr, allowing multiple spells to be cast per turn, but increasing the spell slot usage.

Summon a nature spirit for the duration. If a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit, they can cast spells as an action, even if they already cast a spell as a bonus action on their turn, and they must expend additional spell slots to cast a spell.

{@bold Summoning Ritual} Only one of each type of Summoning Ritual can be active at a time, if a new one is created in the range of this Summoning Ritual, this one ends. The spirit created by this ritual uses the {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars} stat block.
Quickening Zephyr

Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For non-spirit creatures within its range, all skills recharge twice as fast and cost 30% more of the base Energy to cast. This spirit dies after 15...39...45 seconds.

components.m: a phial of amphetamine

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block and when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Smite
entries: Smite a creature with radiant energy, punishing them for attacking.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage and if the target attacked on its last turn, the target takes another {@damage 3d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
Smite
Spell. This attack [sic] deals 10...46...55 Holy [sic] damage. If attacking, your target takes an additional 10...30...35 Holy [sic] damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Strength of Honor
entries: Imbue a creature with the strength of honor, increasing their melee weapon damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Strength of Honor
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally deals 5...21...25 more damage in melee.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd and the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Vital Blessing
entries: Bond yourself to a creature, improving their vitality.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's hit point maximum and current hit points increase by 10.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Vital Blessing
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, target ally has +40...168...200 maximum Health.

components.m: a basket filled with fresh vegtables

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target's hit points increase by an additional 10 for each slot level above 1st and  the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Shadow of Fear
entries: Create a specter of fear in the mind of a group of creatures, preventing them from attacking.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of a target's abilities or magic items, a target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during their turn.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Shadow of Fear
Hex Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes attack 50% slower for the next 5...25...30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Vile Touch
entries: Touch a creature with a damaging touch.
Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d12} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d12} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d12}), 11th level ({@dice 3d12}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d12}).
Vile Touch
Skill. Touch target foe to deal 20...56...65 damage.

races.name: Half-Elf (Variant; Moon Elf or Sun Elf Descent)

spell.name: Phantom Pain
entries: Create the illusion of pain in a creature's mind.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d10} psychic damage. When this spell ends, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GuildWars} for 1 minute.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast. Additionally, you cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Phantom Pain
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...4 Health degeneration. When Phantom Pain ends, that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Power Leak

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and drain their energy.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the creature is casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell fails and has no effect. If it is casting a spell of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the creature's spell fails and has no effect.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make a Charisma saving throw with disadvantage. On a failure, the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d12}. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Leak
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe loses 3...14...17 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the interrupted spell has no effect if its level is less than or equal to the level of the spell slot you used - 1, and the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Shard Storm
entries: Conjure up a storm of ice, and fling it at a creature, slowing them down on a hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Shard Storm
Hex Spell. Send out an ice shard that strikes target foe for 10...70...85 cold damage if it hits and causing target foe to move 66% slower for 2...5...6 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st and the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Ward Against Elements
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, protecting your allies from elemental damage.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target takes acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage, if the target is in the radius of the spell, you can roll {@dice 2d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Ward Against Elements
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Elements at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area gain +24 armor against elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Minor Fireball
entries: Send out a ball of fire that explodes on impact.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Fireball
Spell. Send out a ball of fire that strikes target foe and all adjacent foes for 7...91...112 fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Fire Attunement
entries: Empower your fire magic, by attuning to the fire.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a fire themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a pair of darkened glasses

entries: Fire Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Fire. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Fire Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Air Attunement
entries: Empower your air magic, by attuning to air.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an air, lightning or thunder themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

components.m: a loop of sticks, and 3 feet of yarn

entries: Air Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Air. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill whenever you use Air Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Water Attunement
entries: Empower your water magic, by attuning to water.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast a water themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.

entries: Water Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Water. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Water Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Winter
entries: Call forth a spirit of winter, which converts all elemental damage to cold damage.
Summon a nature spirit for the duration. If a creature is within 120 feet of the nature spirit and takes acid, fire, lightning or thunder damage, they take cold damage instead.

{@bold Summoning Ritual} Only one of each type of Summoning Ritual can be active at a time, if a new one is created in the range of this Summoning Ritual, this one ends. The spirit created by this ritual uses the {@creature Nature Ritual|GuildWars} stat block.
Winter
Nature Ritual. Create a level 1...8...10 spirit. For creatures within its range, all elemental damage is cold damage instead. This spirit dies after 30...126...150 seconds.

components.m: a snowball

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block and when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Divine Boon
entries: Imbue yourself with divine energy to heal every time you support a creature.

For the duration, when you target a friendly creature with a spell, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}.
Initiative cannot be reduced below 0 with this spell.

{@bold Bond.} For the duration, your spell save DC and spell attack bonus are reduced by 1.  You can have a maximum number of bonds active at any one time, equal to your spell casting ability modifier (minimum 1). The bond ends if the target of your bond is ever not within 300 feet of you, or you fall {@condition unconscious}. You can end a bond at any time (no action required).

{@bold Enchantment.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Divine Boon

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer [sic] or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...51...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the reduction to your spell save DC and spell attack bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Defile Flesh
entries: Utter a corrupting curse, defiling a creature's flesh, making it so they heal for less.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 33% less hit points.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Defile Flesh
Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Irresistible Blow
entries: Deliver a mighty blow which is sure to hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d8} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Irresistible Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...17...20 damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 2nd.

spell.name: Debilitating Shot
entries: Fire a debilitating shot, lowering initiative on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and the target's next initiative roll gets reduced by {@dice 2d6}.
Debilitating Shot
Bow Attack. If Debilitating Shot hits, your target loses 1...8...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

spell.name: Pacifism
entries: Magically convince a creature to be pacifist, this lasts until the creature takes damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.
When the target takes damage, this spell ends on that target.

{@bold Hex.} Treat this spell as if you were maintaining {@status concentration} on it, except that it does not break {@status concentration} of other {@status concentration} spells when cast, nor does it break {@status concentration} on itself when other {@status concentration} spells are cast.
Pacifism
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe cannot attack. This effect ends if the target takes damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Necrotic Traversal
entries: Exploit a corpse to teleport to its location and corrupt creatures around it.
